title: MFW one of my favorite memes is declared racist/hate speech by SJW
body:
http://i.imgur.com/ssGUIwK.jpg

https://m.mic.com/articles/155311/pepe-the-frog-meme-racist-adl-hate-symbol#.JX7Ly0yF1

That's it boys. I expect this thread to be deleted and that I'll be banned for racism here shortly. I just wanted to say good bye.

replies.body: What is this horseshit? This frog isn't even correlated with hateful anything except for like the one insubstantial group using it for hatred. The rest of the Internet uses it to troll and nothing more. Adding this along side the swastika would be like if got the Kool-Aid man banned because people used him in a hate crime.  This redamndiculous.
Cause Hillary and all her crazy followers now claim it's racist/sexist.   So of course the MSM jumps all over it saying the same thing

This just in, meme complaints have infiltrated our government all the way to the presidential nominees,

We bring you to our source, the ever reliable League forums.

Godwin's Law (or Godwin's Rule of Nazi Analogies) is an Internet adage asserting that "As an online discussion grows longer, the probability of a comparison involving Nazis or Hitler approaches 1"—​ that is, if an online discussion (regardless of topic or scope) goes on long enough, sooner or later someone will compare ...
I'm confused...

Nothing is safe. Nothing is sacred.

2016 is a joke cancel it
Now you know how Hindus and Buddhists felt after Nazis adopted the swastika as their logo.
This racist Mexican green frog came here illegally and stole our other memes. Deport him and make him come legally.

SJW didn't declare it hate speech, Hilary Clinton's camp did because some trolls made some nazi pepe memes. See here: https://www.hillaryclinton.com/feed/donald-trump-pepe-the-frog-and-white-supremacists-an-explainer/

The entire thing is ridiculous.

And I thought the austrian presidential election is bad....

This site is insane, it's literally a hate page in itself. And they complain about hate speech?

SJWs in a nutshell Mad.   They claim something is hate speech (when there is none) and go running off with hate speech directed at others.   Yet when you call em out on it....suddenly you hate women.   Hate minorities.  A bigot.  All these other things that seriously make you look at them like they are on drugs.
Ngl in modern society among millenials, it's probably a hell of a lot easier to come out as gay than it is to come out as conservative.

It actually is. The Pink Pistols for example get far more hate from LGBT groups than they get from any conservative or right-leaning organization.

The moment you leave the reservation....
Oh definitely. Liberals care more about diversity in shit that doesn't matter than what is actually important: intellectual diversity.

Look at Milo, white gay male grew up in a jewish/christian home, Spoken out against Islam, LOVES black men (his words) and Trump (actually calls him Daddy) and yet the left calls him a bigot, homophobe (that one cracked me up), sexist and racist.

100%. He got banned from Twitter because he cannot control all ~300,000 of his followers. That was just an excuse because they were sick of him calling them out on their bs.

Speaking out against Islam is a no-no nowadays, despite the many issues the religion currently has. I don't hate Muslims as a whole, I just think it needs a serious reformation like Christianity has received.

Liking Trump makes you literally Hitler.

Let's be fair here: he can be a total asshole, but that's because he's doing it so people realize that being an asshole is not a criminal offense. You know what is though? Compromising our national security through reckless behavior with email servers. Forcing your beliefs down others' throats. Trying to wipe out the West. Illegal immigration. Mass rape. Etc. etc.

What also gives me a chuckle though is when people call Milo an antisemite. He's Jewish (ethnically). I won't deny there are some fucked up people on the Right, but the Left seems to be doing much worse right now and at least the Right supports the Second Amendment, which exists to allow us to overthrow a corrupt government. So, what does that say about the politicians who want to disarm us: that they're worried about being overthrown.

Spizzle I totally agree man.  Remember when the Left wanted to use the No-Fly list as a way to designate who can purchase firearms and the Right said "ummmm no fucktards" of course media tried to spin it that the Right was all for letting psychopaths to have guns.   Funny part?  I'm a combat veteran (nickname is my SN) and I was on that list due to my name being close to an alias used by a terrorist.  I went to get my CCW restated and I was detained cause of the fact my name was on a watch list.

Not only that, but in a liberal controlled government, they could just place you on the No-Fly list for something as simple as saying, "I hate the government," or, "I hope (insert liberal politician) breaks their neck."

It allows the government too much control on who to keep guns away from and is a slippery slope. As a wise man, whom I've forgotten the name of, said, "With an armed people, you will have tragedies and murders, but you will _never_ have a genocide."

Her own website! This is insane

Also SJW's are the most fervent anti-Trump pro-Hillary voices

It's all over
Better pack your bags bud, secure your rares and get out of town
Technically not the "SJW"s fault. They're just reacting to trolls making an old fun meme into something worse.

Actually Hillary and her followers made it into a hate/sexist symbol by claiming it was.   Cause Trump re-tweeted a meme of Pepe the frog.   So of course once Trump did that.   "ooops, it's a racist symbol and a sexism issue, yada yada yada,"
This is what happens when we let old people play with memes....
It will be overruled once they realise nobody gives a shit.

This is why I said I wanted Trump over Hillary, Hillary wants to take all our memes. I swear, no one has a sense of humor anymore, and its really scary. The future looks so dark under a Hillary presidency.

Precisely. I mean, I won't say Trump is a lovely fellow, but at least he has heard of this thing called humor and at least a little more personal freedom.

I think we'd get along pretty well. Feel free to add me if you wish to discuss the topic further as Riot isn't fond of people discussing politics much on the boards.

"Can a meme really be racist? Yes and no. "The mere fact of posting a Pepe meme does not mean that someone is racist or white supremacist," the ADL explains. "However, if the meme itself is racist or anti-Semitic in nature, or if it appears in a context containing bigoted or offensive language or symbols, then it may have been used for hateful purposes."

I'm going to try not be toxic towards SJW's but they are not bright in the slightest. They just find random shit to get upset about such as the "Hugh Mungus" incident or many many other scenarios. I love to look up various SJW fail/cringe compilations and it makes me laugh my ass off.
